gyerekegyetem.title: Science, experience, inspiration – for young people!

company.title: BÜCHL Hungaria Ltd.
company.description1: BÜCHL Hungaria is a leading waste management company in Hungary with over 25 years of experience, offering comprehensive solutions for industrial clients.
company.description2: As a member of the German BÜCHL group, we have nearly 75 years of professional background in sustainable waste management.
company.description3: Our goal is to contribute to the realization of the circular economy and help our clients achieve their environmental goals through innovative solutions.

footer.companyDescription: BÜCHL Hungaria Ltd. is a leading industrial waste management company in Hungary. With our innovative solutions, we support sustainable development.

intro.title: Sustainable corporate operations
intro.description: BÜCHL HUNGARIA Ltd. is committed to sustainable corporate operations. Our ESG (Environment, Society, Governance) strategy rests on three main pillars, through which we contribute to building a more sustainable future.

solar.title: Solar panel systems
solar.description: In 2025, we upgraded our company's central site solar power plant, maximizing available capacity by utilizing the entire roof surface. New solar panel systems were built at both of our sites, adapted to daytime consumption and site conditions.

geothermal.title: Geothermal and solar energy
geothermal.description: Since 2015, both of our Győr sites have been operating heating and cooling without fossil fuels. The required energy is provided by ground probe heat pumps. Hot water supply at both sites is provided by solar collectors.

electricVehicles.title: Electric vehicles
electricVehicles.description: The number of electric passenger cars in our fleet is increasing year by year. Additionally, we have completely converted a former diesel container transport truck to electric drive.

bees.title: Bee families serving sustainability
bees.description: In 2022, we actively joined the preservation of biodiversity. As part of this, we supported the installation of three bee families in a trained beekeeper's stock. A single bee family consists of approximately 50,000 bees – these tiny pollinators play a key role in maintaining the ecosystem and protecting biodiversity. The honey produced by the bees is not only nature's valuable gift: it also gives us the opportunity to share our sustainability efforts in tangible form with our colleagues and partners.

carbonFootprint.title: Carbon footprint analysis
carbonFootprint.description: With the professional support of the KÖVET Association, BÜCHL Hungaria's three-year (2019-2021) carbon footprint assessment was completed. The study shows how much greenhouse gas (mainly CO₂) we emit during our activities – directly and indirectly. Based on three years of data, the main sources of our emissions are: site energy consumption, logistics operations, material use. With the help of the Bilan Carbone® methodology, we got a precise picture of which areas have potential for reduction – thus supporting the implementation of our sustainability goals.

kovet.title: Partnership for sustainability - KÖVET Association
kovet.description: BÜCHL Hungaria Ltd. has been a member of the KÖVET Association since 2003, which has been working for the spread of preventive environmental protection and sustainable corporate operations since 1995. The association's goal is to develop and promote methods that serve environmental, social and economic interests simultaneously. As part of our joint work, we regularly participate in the Győr Green Expo, support EMAS roundtable events, and have won awards several times in the 'Money Thrown Out the Window' program.

electricMachinery.title: Electric work machines
electricMachinery.description: In 2025, 61% of our material handling and loading equipment is already electrically powered. This proportion is continuously increasing within our machinery fleet. This significantly reduces our greenhouse gas emissions.

greenEnergy.title: Green energy purchasing
greenEnergy.description: We fully cover the energy needed for our operations with energy from renewable or high-efficiency combined energy production. In 2025, we purchased 3,500 MWh of green energy.

social.title: 2. Social responsibility
social.subtitle: BÜCHL HUNGARIA Ltd. is committed to supporting the community and future generations – whether it's about education, sports, or community events. Our company has been proudly supporting the Pallet Building Camp in Győr organized by the House of Generations for 10 years.

education.title: Educational cooperations
education.description: Professional succession and knowledge sharing are important to us. We cooperate with Szechenyi Istvan University in Győr and the MOBILIS Interactive Exhibition Center, where we support scientific and educational projects and help students with scholarships. We host students from Audi Hungaria School Center every year in a project day format at our company. The program's goal is for children to get familiar with modern waste management processes up close and gain insight into the daily operations of a sustainably operating industrial company.

sports.title: Sports sponsorship
sports.description: At BÜCHL, we believe that supporting sport is not just sponsorship – but investment in the future, the community, and value creation. The dynamism and team spirit of handball, ice hockey, and basketball perfectly reflect our company values. We are proud to be supporters of Győri ETO HC, Győri ETO UNI FKC, and Győr Basketball Club. We have been behind young racing driver Patrik Lipovics' successes from the beginning, because we believe that commitment and continuous development are equally crucial in motorsport and business life.

massEvents.title: Mass sports support
massEvents.description: Since 2000, hundreds of people start every year at the BÜCHL Night Running Race, realized with the main sponsorship of BÜCHL Hungaria Ltd., including our colleagues to our great pride, who compete both individually and in relays. Those who don't put on running shoes help the organizers' work as volunteers.

community.title: Community building with experiences
community.description: The basis of a strong team is shared experience. During the year we regularly organize employee programs – including fishing competitions, children's day, joint trips, retro sandwich day, and Christmas baking – which provide not only relaxation but also real community experience.
community.note: Real community experiences for our employees

duihk.title: DUIHK membership – Active connection with German economy
duihk.description: BÜCHL Hungaria Ltd. is committed to international professional cooperation and responsible corporate operations. As part of this, we have been members of the German-Hungarian Chamber of Industry and Commerce (DUIHK) for many years. DUIHK membership means active connection with German economic actors, offers opportunities for professional development, experience exchange, and supports our company's goal to represent high German standards in environmental services in Hungary.

erp.title: Integrated enterprise management system
erp.description: We installed in 2008 and have been continuously developing and expanding the Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2018 integrated enterprise management system, which also forms the basis of waste record keeping.

quality.title: Committed to quality
quality.description: Proving our commitment and helping our work, we have introduced and maintain the MSZ EN ISO 14001:2015 and the European Union EMAS III. certification, with the 1221/2009/EC regulation, the 2017/1505 regulation, and the 2018/2026 EU regulation amendments. Additionally, the Environment-Centered, Quality and Workplace Health Protection and Safety Integrated Management System according to MSZ EN ISO 9001:2015 and MSZ ISO 45001:2018.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Reliable partner in industrial waste management

company.title: BÜCHL HUNGARIA Ltd.
company.description1: BÜCHL HUNGARIA Ltd. is one of Hungary's leading specialists in the field of industrial waste management, with a special focus on automotive partners. Our company has been present on the domestic market since 2000, and since then we have been committed to providing reliable, innovative and sustainable waste management solutions for our clients. Our specialty is the treatment of hazardous waste from the production processes of manufacturing companies, for which we operate state-of-the-art technologies and equipment.
company.description2: Our company is a member of the Bavarian-headquartered BÜCHL group, which has been successfully operating in the field of waste management, environmental protection, professional consulting and innovation for 75 years. The family-owned, owner-managed corporate group provides us with a stable background and international experience.
company.description3: In Hungary, we serve our partners with 320 employees at 5 locations, with state-of-the-art waste treatment equipment and special vehicles. We perform 615 tonnes of waste transport and 234 tonnes of waste pre-treatment daily. Our services offer a comprehensive solution for the collection, transport and recycling of hazardous and non-hazardous industrial waste. In our own treatment facilities, we produce valuable raw materials and energy carriers from waste, thus actively contributing to the development of the circular economy.
company.description4: During our work, we pay special attention to digitalization, efficiency improvement and sustainability, which have been the pillars of our corporate strategy since 2020. Our goal is to optimize our clients' waste management processes with the help of the most modern technologies and customized logistics solutions, while complying with the strictest legal and environmental regulations.
company.description5: The most important values for BÜCHL HUNGARIA Ltd. are customer satisfaction, high utilization rate, comprehensive safety, and sustainable operation.
company.slogan: BÜCHL HUNGARIA – Reliable partner in industrial waste management.

His managerial work is characterized by openness to innovation, support for teamwork, and a long-term, strategic approach.

group.description3: Their activities cover waste collection, transport and treatment, as well as planning and professional consulting.
group.mission: Their mission: one idea ahead – with efficient and future-oriented services supporting the circular economy.
